fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Stab a player with your knife.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your attack sucessfully kills your target, Your Bloodlust will make you also kill a random player visiting you or your target, Covering their will in blood.
- Since you are a traitor, you cannot obtain the Necronomicon.â€Ž
